name: webdev-starter
description: Boilerplate template for web apps and sites
author: Nikolay Rademacher

scripts.lint: if [ -f .eslintrc.* ]; then eslint . --fix; else yarn setup:eslint && eslint . --fix; fi
scripts.setup:eslint:
yarn add -D eslint && eslint --init && if [ -f package-lock.json ]; then rm package-lock.json && yarn; fi && printf 'node_modules/
build/' > .eslintignore
scripts.setup:typescript:
yarn add -D typescript vite-tsconfig-paths && printf 'import tsconfigPaths from "vite-tsconfig-paths";'$'
'"$(cat vite.config.js)" > vite.config.js && sed -i '' 's/plugins: \[/plugins: \[tsconfigPaths(),/g' vite.config.js && tsc --init
